name: nightwatchjs-gui
description: NightwatchJS GUI implementation for executing tests and manage tests cron jobs

scripts.start:local: ENV=dev concurrently --kill-others "npm run serve-api-watch" "npm run serve-client"

scripts.postinstall: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
